Liana & Camille
March 14, 2026 - San Salvador, El Salvador

The Venue

Our wedding will take place at the venue 'Fôret', just 15 minutes outside the city, in the hills of Comasagua. With its spacious terrace, big garden, and breathtaking views, it felt like the perfect place to say yes and celebrate with you!

View on Google Maps

Pre-Wedding Day - Beach Day
Thursday, March 12, 2026
10:00 – 17:30

Attire: Black tie Suits, ties, floor length dresses and gowns. If wearing a gown, we recommend a shawl or light jacket as it might get chilly at night. Please keep the grass in mind when choosing shoes.
